name: Can Gio mangrove forest, here we go!
description: After 10 minutes on the ferry , we will set foot  onto Can Gio where you can enjoy lots of beautiful sights on the way to the mangrove forest and have fun with the monkeys in the monkey island. Then we will drop by a market near the beach to buy some fresh seafood and have them cooked by the local people on the beach. We will have a great time eating and swimming and wandering along the beach there.
